title: Tropical Key West Historic Coastal Hideaway
description: Take a tropical escape to Kimpton Ella's Cottages, an IHG Hotel, an intimate guesthouse in the heart of Florida’s Key West. This historic property boasts a blend of boutique elegance and charming cottage character, with a white weatherboard front porch overlooking lush tropical gardens. Wander through the romantic streets, enjoy the vibrant local nightlife, and watch the sunset from the terrace of Bungalow Bar while sipping a classic Rum Runner cocktail.
location_description: Kimpton Ella's Cottages, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 811 Simonton Street, Key West, Florida 33040, United States

vendor_name: Fitch Lodge - Key West Historic Inns
title: Key West Heritage Conch House near Historic Seaport
description: Set within four heritage, timber-framed ‘conch houses’ built in traditional Bahamian style, Kimpton Fitch Lodge, an IHG Hotel offers guests the perfect base to explore Key West’s nightflower-filled gardens and romantic beachscapes, all just moments from the island's historic seaport. Boasting just 44 restored guestrooms and suites, this boutique hotel is dripping in tropical cool - spend your days exploring technicolour reefs, evenings hopping between equally vibrant nightspots, and return to an idyllic retreat.
location_description: Kimpton Fitch Lodge, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 1030 Eaton Street, Key West, Florida 33040, United States

title: Tropical Key West Florida Escape in Historic Guesthouses with Outdoor Pool
description: Dive into luxury at the secluded and romantic Kimpton Ridley House, an IHG Hotel, a boutique oasis located in the heart of Florida’s tropical Key West . Beneath the lush palm fronds, you will find a historic estate, boasting white weatherboarding, picket fences, wrap-around verandas and low-hanging trees - the embodiment of bygone elegance. Snorkel through the pristine turquoise ocean, take a dip in the pool, and lounge on the picture-perfect white veranda.
offer_address: 601 Caroline Street, Key West, Florida 33040, United States
